ch.epfl.lasec.mova
Class CommunicationProtocol

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lasec.mova.CommunicationProtocol

public class CommunicationProtocol
extends java.lang.Object

Class implementing functions to communicate Mova parameters, key, and start confirmation or denial protocols.

Author:
Sebastien Duc

Field Summary
static int ASK_CONFIRMATION
          Used by the client to ask the server to start the confirmation protocol

static int ASK_TO_SIGN
          Used by the client to ask the server to sign a message the client sends him.

askConfirmation

public static boolean askConfirmation(java.io.InputStream in,
                                      java.io.OutputStream out,
                                      Message m,
                                      MovaSignature s,
                                      Mova mova,
                                      MovaPublicKey pk,
                                      int Icon)
                               throws java.io.IOException
Method used to ask for the confirmation of validity of (m,s). It starts the MOVA confirmation protocol.

Parameters:
in -
out -
m - message
s - signature
mova - mova instance
pk - Public key
Icon - the security parameter. It can be decided by the verifier if not convinced by the default value sent by the prover.
Returns:
true if the signature is valid. Returns false if the confirmation failed. This doesn't mean that it is not valid.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

askConfirmation

public static boolean askConfirmation(java.io.InputStream in,
                                      java.io.OutputStream out,

askDenial

public static boolean askDenial(java.io.InputStream in,
                                java.io.OutputStream out,
                                Message m,
                                MovaSignature s,
                                Mova mova,
                                MovaPublicKey pk,
                                int Iden)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Method used to ask for the denial of validity of (m,s). It starts the MOVA denial protocol.

Parameters:
in -
out -
m - message
s - signature
mova - MOVA instance
pk - Public key
Iden - the security parameter. It can be decided by the verifier if not convinced by the default value sent by the prover.
Returns:
true if the signature is invalid. Returns false if the denial failed. This doesn't mean that it is not invalid.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

acceptConfirmation

public static boolean acceptConfirmation(java.io.InputStream in,
                                         java.io.OutputStream out,
                                         Mova mova,
                                         KeyPair kp)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Method used to accept the confirmation of validity that was asked and start the MOVA confirmation protocol. Method to call when ASK_CONFIRMATION was received.

Parameters:
in -
out -
mova - MOVA instance
kp - Key pair (public,secret)
Returns:
true if the signature is valid. Returns false if the confirmation failed. This doesn't mean that it is not valid.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

                                   java.io.OutputStream out,

                            throws java.io.IOException

out -

kp - Key pair (public,secret)
Returns:

java.io.IOException
